sys_metadata_link.payload:
vintage false 60
Deck Size
60+
Number of Players
2
Game Duration
20 Minutes

Why Play This Format?

  • Vast card selection available from all Magic sets!
  • Cards do not rotate as new Standard sets are released.
  • Format with the biggest card pool and highest power levels.
  • Extensive card combo possibilities!

Play Rules/Modifiers

This format allows for cards to be played from all Magic card sets and includes cards from expansions and special sets (with the exception of cards on the banned list)! This format holds a restricted list which limits the use of a card to a single copy allowed either in the sideboard or in the main deck. Vintage is a constructed format does not allow your combined deck and sideboard to contain more than four of any individual card.

  • Minimum deck size of 60 cards
  • Up to 15 cards in your sideboard (if used)
]]> Vintage 20 admin 2025-07-24 04:12:12 7e603fe7c37ee6500efafbfdd40131ca 0 admin 2025-07-24 04:12:12 true

<div>
<h2>Why Play This Format?</h2>
<div>
<ul style="list-style-position: inside;"><li>Vast card selection available from all <em>Magic</em> sets!</li><li>Cards do not rotate as new Standard sets are released.</li><li>Format with the biggest card pool and highest power levels.</li><li>Extensive card combo possibilities!</li></ul>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<h2>Play Rules/Modifiers</h2>
<div>
<p>This format allows for cards to be played from all Magic card sets and includes cards from expansions and special sets (with the exception of cards on the banned list)! This format holds a restricted list which limits the use of a card to a single copy allowed either in the sideboard or in the main deck. Vintage is a constructed format does not allow your combined deck and sideboard to contain more than four of any individual card.</p>
<ul style="list-style-position: inside;"><li>Minimum deck size of 60 cards</li><li>Up to 15 cards in your sideboard (if used)</li></ul>
</div>
</div>]]></description>
